prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a sleek design and subtle green accents.
I want a Pokemon that resembles an insect, with a predominantly white body and long antennae.
Generate a creature that has a unique evolution style, showcasing both bug and ghost elements.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a forest, with earthy tones and a camouflage feature.
Imagine a small, agile Pokemon that can blend seamlessly into its surroundings, perfect for stealth.
Design a Pokemon that has a shell-like appearance, showcasing shades of white and green.
Give me a Pokemon that represents transformation, with features that hint at its future evolution.
